title: Grocery Shopping
description: Buy all necessary ingredients for planned meals.

title: Clean Refrigerator
description: Remove expired items, wipe down shelves and drawers.

title: Meal Prep Sunday
description: Prepare meals for the upcoming week to save time.

title: Deep Clean Oven
description: Clean the oven interior, remove racks and clean separately.

title: Organize Pantry
description: Check expiration dates, consolidate items, and organize shelves.

title: Sharpen Knives
description: Sharpen all kitchen knives for safe and efficient cooking.

title: Clean Kitchen Sink and Faucet
description: Scrub the sink, clean the faucet, and unclog the drain if necessary.
